Text.Page:
Call it a mission of mercy.

We face many enemies here, but the {@LinkCreature:33#15#mekonari magisters} and {@LinkCreature:33#67#coalheart inquisitors} are the cruelest...the most sadistic.

They torture the living and the dead alike. Put an end to their cruelty.
You honor both the living and the dead with this brave action, <PCNAME>.
